name: Grand Moff Tarkin (V)
Lore: 'Leader. Governor of Outer Rim Territories. Commanded Death Star. Helped disband Imperial Senate. Defined doctrine of rule by fear. Plotted to use Death Star against Emperor.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Destiny +2 when drawn for destiny. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise (if with Vader or an Imperial leader, may add one instead). During battle, if you just drew a destiny < number of imperials here, may cancel and redraw that destiny.',
